languages.text: Надпись на палатке гласит "Лазарет". Внутри похрапывает тело, не имеющее признаков болезни или ранений, зато дышащее невыносимым перегаром.
The word on the tent reads, "Infirmary." There's a snoring body inside without any signs of illness or wounds, but it does hit you with an unbearable wave of stale alcohol.
languages.original_text: Надпись на палатке гласит "Лазарет". Внутри похрапывает тело, не имеющее признаков болезни или ранений, зато дышащее невыносимым перегаром.

traits.locale_text: The word on the tent reads, "Infirmary." There's a snoring body inside without any signs of illness or wounds, but it does hit you with an unbearable wave of stale alcohol.

The word on the tent reads, "Infirmary." There's a snoring body inside without any signs of illness or wounds, but it does hit you with an unbearable wave of stale alcohol.

languages.text: 帐篷上写着“医务室”，里面有个人正在打呼噜。这个人的身上没有任何生病或受伤的迹象，只是传来了一股令人难以忍受的陈年酒臭。
languages.original_text: The word on the tent reads, "Infirmary." There's a snoring body inside without any signs of illness or wounds, but it does hit you with an unbearable wave of stale alcohol.

traits.locale_text: 帐篷上写着“医务室”，里面有个人正在打呼噜。这个人的身上没有任何生病或受伤的迹象，只是传来了一股令人难以忍受的陈年酒臭。

languages.text: En la tienda está escrita la palabra «Enfermería». Hay alguien roncando en su interior sin ninguna herida ni signos de enfermedad, pero cubierto de un hedor a alcohol.
languages.original_text: The word on the tent reads, "Infirmary." There's a snoring body inside without any signs of illness or wounds, but it does hit you with an unbearable wave of stale alcohol.

traits.locale_text: En la tienda está escrita la palabra «Enfermería». Hay alguien roncando en su interior sin ninguna herida ni signos de enfermedad, pero cubierto de un hedor a alcohol.

languages.text: テントには「医務室」という言葉が書かれている。中でいびきをかいている人物は病気や負傷の兆候はないが、耐え難いほどの酒臭さが襲ってくる。
languages.original_text: The word on the tent reads, "Infirmary." There's a snoring body inside without any signs of illness or wounds, but it does hit you with an unbearable wave of stale alcohol.

traits.locale_text: テントには「医務室」という言葉が書かれている。中でいびきをかいている人物は病気や負傷の兆候はないが、耐え難いほどの酒臭さが襲ってくる。

languages.text: Auf dem Zelt steht "Krankenstation". Im Inneren liegt eine schnarchende Gestalt ohne Anzeichen von Krankheit oder Wunden, aber dafür mit einer unerträglichen Alkoholausdünstung.
languages.original_text: The word on the tent reads, "Infirmary." There's a snoring body inside without any signs of illness or wounds, but it does hit you with an unbearable wave of stale alcohol.

traits.locale_text: Auf dem Zelt steht "Krankenstation". Im Inneren liegt eine schnarchende Gestalt ohne Anzeichen von Krankheit oder Wunden, aber dafür mit einer unerträglichen Alkoholausdünstung.

languages.text: Sur la tente est inscrit le mot « Infirmerie ». À l'intérieur, des ronflements émanent d'un corps inerte qui ne présente aucun signe de maladie ou de blessure, mais dégage une très forte odeur d'alcool frelaté.
languages.original_text: The word on the tent reads, "Infirmary." There's a snoring body inside without any signs of illness or wounds, but it does hit you with an unbearable wave of stale alcohol.

traits.locale_text: Sur la tente est inscrit le mot « Infirmerie ». À l'intérieur, des ronflements émanent d'un corps inerte qui ne présente aucun signe de maladie ou de blessure, mais dégage une très forte odeur d'alcool frelaté.

languages.text: Çadırın üzerinde "Revir" yazıyor. İçeride bir hastalık veya yara emaresi olmayan biri horluyor. Bayat alkol kokusu, dayanılmaz bir keskinlikle yüzüne vuruyor.
languages.original_text: The word on the tent reads, "Infirmary." There's a snoring body inside without any signs of illness or wounds, but it does hit you with an unbearable wave of stale alcohol.

traits.locale_text: Çadırın üzerinde "Revir" yazıyor. İçeride herhangi bir hastalık veya yaraya sahipmiş gibi gözükmeyen biri horluyor. Bayat alkol kokusu dayanılmaz bir dalga hâlinde yüzüne vuruyor.
